lexUnit.name: grated.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: having been reduced (food) to small shreds by rubbing it on a grater.

sentence.text: The big talking point is the addition of grated chocolate to darken and enrich the sauce .
His voice was like grated glass , near and frightening .
The skin was brown with grated nutmeg .
More like a prison than a private residence , the windows were grated and the huge door barred and bound with iron bands .
That 's grated chocolate .
The pastry case contains a spicy beef taco filling and the grated cheese topping browns in the oven to give a tempting appearance .
Pile the meat into the pastry case and top with the sliced tomatoes and then the grated cheese .
Serve with grated Parmesan cheese and a green salad .
Make a white sauce with the milk and cornflour and add most of the grated cheese .
She made herself a cup of tea , cut bread for toast , beat up eggs with grated cheese in a pan .
Almost any flavouring can be added -- from garlic , parsley and grated lemon zest to anchovy paste or finely minced black truffle .
Spread the chopped onion and grated lemon over the base of a baking dish .
Flavour with grated lemon rind and vanilla .
This basic recipe can be adapted by adding grated lemon or orange rind , or four pieces of chopped stem ginger just before freezing .
Stir in the juice and finely grated rind of one orange , pour over the rhubarb and leave to cool , then chill before serving .
Decorate with grated orange rind and serve warm with yogurt sprinkled with a few poppy seeds .
Beat in the grated chocolate .
I prefer it coated in very coarsely grated black pepper and it should always be sliced extremely thinly .
Garnish with chopped red chilli , grated Parmesan and parsley .
Cook a 4-oz. pack of frozen peas or runner beans and serve with an uncooked grated sharp-tasting eating apple to save the trouble of making apple sauce .
With the more predatory species , like managuense , include meat with the diet , -- earthworms , cooked chicken , prawns , grated beef heart , or even runted fry from other spawnings .
Add the parboiled vegetables and grated nutmeg ; toss to coat in the hot butter and oil .
Put strained liquid , sour cream , half coriander and grated Edam into a food processor or blender and whizz until smooth .
Gradually add grated horseradish to the cream until you have the desired hotness .
